pages.text: Energy is allocated every turn, and is mainly used to play buddies. Each buddycard has a cost on it that tells you how much you need to play it with a sun icon, and you will lose that much when it is played. The amount allocated each turn starts off slow, equal to the turn number, before maxing out at 5☀ per turn.

This means the player who goes first only gets 1☀, then the next player gets 2☀, then they get 3☀ on their next turn, and so on. Unused energy will carry on to your next turn, but a player can only get 10☀ a turn from allocation.
